title: Bianchi Specialissima road bike gets limited Pro Racing Team Reparto Corse frameset
content:
Bianchi’s ultralight carbon Specialissima road bike gets a new Pro Racing Team limited edition frameset option, so celeste lovers can create their own Bianchi Reparto…

The post Bianchi Specialissima road bike gets limited Pro Racing Team Reparto Corse frameset appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
